sourcesContent:
import React, {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { Wrapper,Back,Container ,Image, InfoContainer, Title, InfoColumns, Column,Info, Strong, BordersContainer, BorderLabel, Button} from './styles' function DetailPage({match}) { const [ country,setCountry] = useState([]) const [loading,setLoading] = useState(true) useEffect(() =>{ fetch('https://restcountries.com/v3.1/alpha/' + match.params.id ) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setCountry(data[0]) setLoading(false) }) }, []) if(loading){ return
loading
} return ( Back {country.name.common} Native Name:{country.name.nativeName.common} Population:{country.population} Region:{country.region} Sub Region:{country.subregion} Capital: Top Level Domain Currencies Languages Border Countries ) } export default DetailPage
